mapper.select:
select svh.*,concat_ws('-',cb.no,cbu.no,cbue.room_number) as room_name,ur.name,ur.tel from sys_voice_housekeeper as svh,cpm_building_unit_estate as cbue,cpm_building_unit as cbu,cpm_building as cb,user_resident as ur
and svh.building_unit_estate_id = cbue.id and cbue.building_unit_id = cbu.id and cbu.building_id = cb.id and svh.resident_id = ur.id
and ur.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and ur.tel like concat('%',#{tel},'%')
and svh.status = #{status}
and cbue.room_number like concat('%',#{roomNumber},'%')
and cbu.no like concat('%',#{unitNo},'%')
and cb.no like concat('%',#{estateNo},'%')
